content: Silver is a service for automatic billing. It assigns customers to plans and creates automatic invoice entries .
description: Silver is a service for automatic billing. It assigns customers to plans and creates automatic invoice entries .
summary: Silver is a service for automatic billing. It assigns customers to plans and creates automatic invoice entries .
title: Getting started

content: Each day a process runs and scans every active subscription. For each subscription schedules an invoicing job taking into account generate_after.
